DOC.brief_title: Healthy Kids-Houston : A Community Childhood Obesity Intervention Program
DOC.detailed_description: Childhood obesity major health issue United States , particularly among minority child . An integrated after-school program offer structure fun physical activity nutrition behavior lesson community center operate Houston Parks Recreation Department might prevent obesity among minority child live neighborhood .
